quote: Sucking at something is the first step towards being sorta good at something.
author: Jake the Dog

quote: Who cares if one more light goes out in the sky of a million stars? Well, I do.
author: Linkin Park

quote: We live in capitalism, its power seems inescapable — but then, so did the divine right of kings. Any human power can be resisted and changed by human beings.
author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quote: The thing that we call “laziness” is often actually a powerful self-preservation instinct. When we feel unmotivated, directionless, or “lazy,” it's because our bodies and minds are screaming for some peace and quiet.
author: Devon Price

quote: I live for my dreams and a pocketful of gold.
author: Led Zeppelin
book: Over The Hills And Far Away

quote: Mr. Bat is thinking about the circumstances. Mr. Bat feels so confused.
author: Mr. Bat

quote: For we each of us deserve everything, every luxury that was ever piled in the tombs of the dead kings, and we each of us deserve nothing, not a mouthful of bread in hunger.
author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quote: Tomorrow we have no sheh, tomorrow we are sensible and shy. Do it now!
author: Storm Constantine
book: Wraeththu: The Bewitchments of Love and Hate
